channel.title: [GFX] 317 Help! [GFX]
channel.description:
Alright, the server I'm working with, is a DemisePk base, now, I'm working on the specials for the GodSwords, the only problem I'm having is, the GFX don't seem to exist. So,
1.) Where is the GFX stored? 2.) How do I create a custom GFX?
Thanks in advance Sideways_8
P.S. I have MSN -----> rockthefender92@aim.com

item.title: [GFX] 317 Help! [GFX]
item.dc:creator: @madd_mac madd mac
item.description:
@madd_mac wrote:

lol tbh, gfx are based in the client at i think class9.java haven’t worked with clients in ages gfx is the oposite of emote on servers like for example on ags the white swiglly thing is a gfx and the emote is the person going up and twiizering wow i can’t be formal when talking about this stuff

Read full topic

item.title: [GFX] 317 Help! [GFX]
item.dc:creator: @Sideways_8 Sideways_8
item.description:
@Sideways_8 wrote:

Well sorry, I actually didn’t know if GFX’s were client sided or server sided, but now that you say that, that makes sense xD Sorry :b

Read full topic
